message: I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm really interested in your product but $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now.  How about $90?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $110, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $110 is still a bit too high for me.  Would you be willing to go to $95?  I'm really hoping to work something out here.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I can meet you halfway at $105, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
